query.currentGamePhase: SELECT * FROM spq_risk_game_phase_name PN JOIN spq_risk_game_phase GP ON (GP.ID_GAME_PHASE = PN.ID_PHASE) WHERE GP.ID_GAME = :id_game
query.currentGameUserPhase: SELECT * FROM spq_risk_game_turn_phase TP JOIN spq_risk_user UU ON (UU.ID_USER = TP.ID_USER) WHERE TP.ID_GAME = :id_game
query.allGameUser: SELECT UU.* FROM spq_risk_user UU JOIN spq_risk_game_user UD on (UD.ID_USER = UU.ID_USER)
